unnormalised: Subject: My Journey with Yoga: From Exhaustion to Energy
normalised: Subject: My Journey with Yoga: From Exhaustion to Energy

unnormalised: Hey everyone! I wanted to share my personal experience with yoga, as it's been a real game-changer for my overall lifestyle and wellness.
normalised: Hey everyone! I wanted to share my personal experience with yoga, as it's been a real game changer for my overall lifestyle and wellness.

unnormalised: Like many people living in bustling cities like Mumbai, I was constantly stressed and exhausted. Juggling a demanding job in finance and trying to maintain a semblance of social life felt impossible. By the time I got home at 21:00 hrs each day, I just wanted to collapse. Then, on 26/01/2023, my doctor, Dr. Sharma, strongly suggested I try yoga to manage my stress levels.
normalised: Like many people living in bustling cities like Mumbai, I was constantly stressed and exhausted. Juggling a demanding job in finance and trying to maintain a semblance of social life felt impossible. By the time I got home at twenty one hundred hours each day, I just wanted to collapse. Then, on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty three, my doctor, Doctor Sharma, strongly suggested I try yoga to manage my stress levels.

unnormalised: Initially, I was skeptical. I thought yoga was just stretching, but I was so wrong! I started with a beginner's class at a local studio near my house – "Yoga Shala, Bandra". The instructor, Priya, was amazing. She patiently guided us through asanas like Surya Namaskar and Trikonasana.
normalised: Initially, I was skeptical. I thought yoga was just stretching, but I was so wrong! I started with a beginner's class at a local studio near my house – "Yoga Shala, Bandra". The instructor, Priya, was amazing. She patiently guided us through asanas like Surya Namaskar and Trikonasana.

unnormalised: Within a few weeks, I noticed a significant difference. I felt more energetic, even after long days at work. My sleep improved; I wasn’t tossing and turning until 03:00 AM anymore. My back pain, something I'd been struggling with for months, started to ease. It’s amazing how connecting my breath with movement could make such a difference.
normalised: Within a few weeks, I noticed a significant difference. I felt more energetic, even after long days at work. My sleep improved; I wasn’t tossing and turning until three zero zero A M anymore. My back pain, something I'd been struggling with for months, started to ease. It’s amazing how connecting my breath with movement could make such a difference.

unnormalised: Now, I try to practice at least three times a week, sometimes even incorporating a quick 15-minute session at 07:00 hrs before work. It’s not just physical; the meditation aspect has helped me become more mindful and present in my daily life. I even attended a weekend retreat at the Isha Yoga Center in Coimbatore recently, which was an incredible experience.
normalised: Now, I try to practice at least three times a week, sometimes even incorporating a quick fifteen minute session at zero seven hundred hours before work. It’s not just physical; the meditation aspect has helped me become more mindful and present in my daily life. I even attended a weekend retreat at the Isha Yoga Center in Coimbatore recently, which was an incredible experience.

unnormalised: Yoga isn't a quick fix, it's a journey. And I’m so glad I started mine on 26th January. If you're feeling overwhelmed, I highly recommend giving it a try. You might be surprised at the positive impact it has on your life.
